io.foxtrot.android.sdk.controllers.auth

Class LoginCallback

  • Object
    • io.foxtrot.android.sdk.controllers.auth.LoginCallback

  • public abstract class LoginCallback
extends Object
    Class to capture success and error callbacks during the login process 

      public class LoginActivity extends Activity {

    private final Handler handler = new Handler(getMainLooper());
    private final LoginCallback loginCallback = new LoginCallback() {
      @Nonnull
      @Override
      public Handler getHandler() {
        return handler;
      }

      @Override
      public void onSuccess() {
        super.onSuccess();
        // Proceed to next activity
      }

      @Override
      public void onError(LoginError loginError) {
        super.onError(loginError);
        if (loginError == LoginError.NETWORK_ERROR) {
          // try again later
        } else if (loginError == LoginError.INVALID_API_KEY) {
          // contact your administrator for a valid api key
        }
      }
    };

    @Override
    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
      super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
      FoxtrotSDK.getInstance().registerLoginCallback(loginCallback);
      FoxtrotSDK.getInstance().login(Driver.builder().setId("id").setName("name").build());
    }

    @Override
    protected void onStop() {
      super.onStop();
      FoxtrotSDK.getInstance().unregisterLoginCallback(loginCallback);
    }

  }
    See Also:
    FoxtrotSDK, LoginError
